snippet.title: Roll The Bones - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Let's roll them bones!
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2527550/Roll_The_Bones/

RTB is a high-paced, action-packed roguelite that allows you to craft a loadout from hundreds of unique spell-dice. Roll the dice to reload equipped spells, some of which are top-tier enemy annihilators while others may accelerate your own self-destruction. Upgrade your dice during runs and complete all 20 dungeon floors.

Dice will be rolled in 2024, wishlist now!
In the meantime, join Shrimp Industries on Discord to talk shit with the dev and be up to date:
https://discord.gg/DQ8ZdSX98J

#roguelite #roguelike #indie #steam #game #videogames #RTB #rollthebones #bones #2D #action #topdown #shooter #dice #spells #fantasy #spellcaster #trailer #teaser #gameplay #magic
